Uses of Package
colorguard

  • Classes in colorguard used by colorguard 
    Class Description
    Client
    Client class uses server sockets and acts as a client that connects to a server
    Clone
    Clone is a powerup, hence it extends Powerup.
    Colorguard
    The Colorguard class stores the state of the game and changes certain objects dynamically based on commands Colorguard stores the GameBoard, turns, and the state of a turn
    Flag
    Flag is a type of GameObject.
    GameBoard
    GameBoard class represents the board the game is played on It stores the jails, flag zones, and powerups To update the board, several methods are available, mainly movePiece(Piece p)
    GameObject
    GameObject serves as the superclass for all objects in the game (Pieces and Powerups).
    HighWall
    HighWall class prevents all enemies from jumping over defenses, excluding Teleporter
    Location
    Location class represents a 2D point on a grid.
    Paralysis
    Paralysis class that prevents all enemies in a 7 by 7 around a given Piece for 2 turns
    Piece
    This class is the general abstract Piece class where it holds all the generic characteristics of a piece.
    Powerup
    Powerup inherits GameObject and serves as a superclass to all powerups in ther game.
    Server
    Server is used for networking
    Swapper
    Swapper classes flips any 2 given pieces on the board for one side
    Throw
    Throw class enables a Piece to throw the flag to a team mate in the enemy starting side.
